name: OSES
description: OSES is a strategic post-apocalyptic shooter in which 3 characters fight by using different guns to survive the zombie hordes in various scenarios and game modes.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 or newer Processor: Intel Dual Core or better with SSE2 support or equivalent AMD family Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
